class.name: SampleLibrary
class.brief_description: Library that contains a collection of samples.
class.description: Library that contains a collection of [Sample], each identified by a text ID. This is used as a data container for the majority of the SamplePlayer classes and derivatives.

method.name: add_sample
method.description: Add a sample to the library, with a given text ID.

method.name: get_sample
method.description: Return the sample from the library matching the given text ID. Return null if the sample is not found.

method.name: has_sample
method.description: Return true if the sample text ID exists in the library.

method.name: remove_sample
method.description: Remove the sample matching the given text ID.

method.name: sample_get_pitch_scale
method.description: Return the pitch scale for the given sample.

method.name: sample_get_volume_db
method.description: Return the volume (in dB) for the given sample.

method.name: sample_set_pitch_scale
method.description: Set the pitch scale for the given sample.

method.name: sample_set_volume_db
method.description: Set the volume (in dB) for the given sample.
